roleset.name: supply with weapons again
roleset.note: REARM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rearm' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry equip-13.4.2-1. (from rearm.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: But now the possibility of ``diplomatic movement'' (Vietnam's withdrawal, the Baker initiative) has put that plan on hold, with the proviso that if the going got rough, the U.S. would then rearm the opposition.
